name: enhanced-gaming-discord-bot
description: Enhanced Discord Gaming Server Bot with separated commands, role management, welcome system, gaming sessions, and video reactions

scripts.build:noop: echo 'Build complete - no compilation needed for Node.js'
scripts.lint: echo 'No linter configured - install eslint if needed'
scripts.backup: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); if(fs.existsSync('./bot_data')){const date=new Date().toISOString().slice(0,10); fs.mkdirSync('./backups',{recursive:true}); require('child_process').execSync(`cp -r ./bot_data ./backups/bot_data_${date}`); console.log('Backup created in ./backups/');}else{console.log('No bot_data to backup');}"
